short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A customizable new tab page with live age counter, date countdown, and favorites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a better alternative I developed for all the age counter extensions on chrome. You can select a dark or light theme, add favorites and a personal date countdown at the bottom of the screen as well. It also has a cursor following marker that enhances the UI.
